mapper.insert: insert into public.examinations (user_id, testing_id, finished_at) values (#{entity.userId}, #{entity.testingId}, #{entity.finishedAt})
mapper.select:
select e.id as id, e.user_id as userId, e.testing_id as testingId, e.finished_at as finishedAt, ea.id as eaId, ea.test_id as eaTestId, ea.variant_id as eaVariantId from public.examinations e left join public.examinations_answers ea on ea.examination_id = e.id where e.user_id = #{userId} and e.testing_id = #{testingId}
and e.finished_at > #{finishedAt}
